text_block_list.name: Marvelous Sunday
text_block_list.text: Marvelous! You two join in too now!!

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
T-That's a bit sudden, don't you think? 
I don't believe there's anything currently 
happening that you'd call "marvelous".

text_block_list.name: Marvelous Sunday
text_block_list.text:
What gives!? The three of us are finally 
together! Isn't that super marvelous?

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
I see…… So you feel that there's value in 
us being together? That's a great honor.

text_block_list.name: Marvelous Sunday
text_block_list.text:
Yep, yep! That's why this'll be even 
more marvelous if you two shout with me! 
Okay now, one more time! Ready……

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: Ahh! Y-You made me go with the flow. But still, I feel refreshed somehow…… Alright, Brian, you try it with us too.

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text:
Have you gone mad, sis? 
……I'll pass.

text_block_list.name: Marvelous Sunday
text_block_list.text:
No passing allooowed!! Just shout 
cheerfully from the bottom of your heart! 
Come on now! Come on!!

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: It's refreshing, you know? Come on!
